arts.ttl: Metz predicted XI v Lyon: Jessy Deminguet and Cheikh Sabaly doubts
arts.sum: Jessy Deminguet and Cheikh Sabaly, who would ordinarily start, are doubts for FC Metz as they prepare to face Olympique Lyonnais on Saturday night. Former RC Strasbourg Alsace midfielder Deminguet…

arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI vs Metz: Pavel Šulc to make first start
arts.sum: Lyon will be hoping to continue their winning start to the season as they welcome Metz to the Groupama Stadium on Saturday night. Les Gones kick-started their season with three…
